name: 能代 - Noshiro Azur Lane LORA. / 能代 (アズールレーン)
description:
4th Lora Release, 能代 - Noshiro!

He can do Base Default Skin + Other skin & he's flexible to any outfit, see Examples image and descriptions.

Work with any Model, i used YesMix, MeinaMixV8, MechanicMixV2 for examples.

Put everything in Filter for seeing all images!

Trained on 239+ Images with Good quality, that i tried personally manually, I picked only the Best one. (SFW + And some NFSW)

Weight: Best Result: 0.8-1 Works perfectly at 1.

You need to describe a little also, I reducted the number of prompt needed too.

  1. Default Skin with Cardignan, without, or Only White shirt: Most Precise (Trigger: NshroV4)

  2. Hold the Ice Skin: Precise. (Trigger: NshroKR4)

  3. Fragrance of the Eastern Snow Skin: Precise. (Trigger: NshroF4)

  4. Cozy Enclave Skin: Precise. (Trigger: NshroWS4)

  5. Uncharted Festival Grounds Skin: Middle up but works. (Trigger: NshroFS4)

  6. Noshiro: Xanadu's Eventide Skin: Middle but somewhat works. (Trigger: NshroS4)

  7. Noshiro: Wedding Skin: Not Precise, can get the skin but not the color good. (Trigger: NshroW4)

  8. Unwinding in the Sunshine Skin: Not very Precise but somewhat works. (Trigger: NshroX4)

Again see examples images for a Better Idea.

Negative Embedding used: EasyNegative, BadPrompt2.

Share you're image in Comments :).
